message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to acquire this unique and valuable product.  Given its exceptional qualities, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I believe this reflects its true worth.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm willing to pay a premium for this product. However, I think $1,200,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product is truly unique. I could meet you halfway between our two offers. What do you say to $1,075,000?

I understand that the product has unique value, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $1,050,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
